reuze

Class ff_OBJWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.ff_OBJWriter

  • public class ff_OBJWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Extremely bare bones Wavefront OBJ 3D format exporter. Purely handles the writing of data to the .obj file, but does not have any form of mesh management. See gb_TriangleMesh for details. Needs to get some more TLC in future versions.
    See Also:
    gb_TriangleMesh#saveAsOBJ(OBJWriter)
